SEARCH
Package com.codedstreams.codedx.sso.sdk.auth

Interface SsoAuthenticator

All Known Implementing Classes:
SsoAuthenticatorImpl
public interface SsoAuthenticator
Interface for performing authentication operations with the CodedX SSO service.

This interface provides methods for user authentication, token management, and user profile retrieval.

Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.5
Author:
Nestor Martourez

  • Method Details

    • login

      AuthResponse login(String identifier, String password) throws SsoException
      Authenticates a user with the provided credentials.

      The identifier can be either an email address or a phone number.

      Parameters:
      identifier - the user's email or phone number
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      AuthResponse containing tokens and user information
      Throws:
      SsoException - if authentication fails
      IllegalArgumentException - if identifier or password is null/empty

    • refreshToken

      AuthResponse refreshToken(String refreshToken) throws SsoException
      Refreshes an expired access token using a valid refresh token.
      Parameters:
      refreshToken - the refresh token obtained during login
      Returns:
      AuthResponse with new access and refresh tokens
      Throws:
      SsoException - if token refresh fails
      IllegalArgumentException - if refreshToken is null/empty

    • logout

      void logout(String accessToken) throws SsoException
      Invalidates the current user session (logs out the user).
      Parameters:
      accessToken - the current access token
      Throws:
      SsoException - if logout fails
      IllegalArgumentException - if accessToken is null/empty

    • getUserProfile

      UserProfile getUserProfile(String accessToken) throws SsoException
      Retrieves the user profile information for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      accessToken - the valid access token
      Returns:
      UserProfile containing user information
      Throws:
      SsoException - if profile retrieval fails
      IllegalArgumentException - if accessToken is null/empty

    • validateToken

      boolean validateToken(String accessToken) throws SsoException
      Validates whether an access token is still valid and not expired.
      Parameters:
      accessToken - the access token to validate
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SsoException - if validation fails due to network or server error
      IllegalArgumentException - if accessToken is null/empty

    • registerUser

      void registerUser(String email, String phoneNumber, String password) throws SsoException
      Registers a new user with the SSO service.

      At least one of email or phone number must be provided.

      Parameters:
      email - the user's email address (optional)
      phoneNumber - the user's phone number (optional)
      password - the user's password
      Throws:
      SsoException - if registration fails
      IllegalArgumentException - if both email and phoneNumber are null/empty

    • requestPasswordReset

      void requestPasswordReset(String identifier, boolean isEmail) throws SsoException
      Requests a password reset for the specified identifier (email or phone).
      Parameters:
      identifier - the user's email or phone number
      isEmail - true if identifier is an email, false if phone number
      Throws:
      SsoException - if password reset request fails
      IllegalArgumentException - if identifier is null/empty

    • verifyAccount

      void verifyAccount(String code, String identifier) throws SsoException
      Verifies a user's account using the code sent via email or SMS.
      Parameters:
      code - the verification code received by the user
      identifier - the user's email or phone number
      Throws:
      SsoException - if verification fails
      IllegalArgumentException - if code or identifier is null/empty

    • resendVerificationCode

      void resendVerificationCode(String identifier) throws SsoException
      Resends the verification code to the user's email or phone.
      Parameters:
      identifier - the user's email or phone number
      Throws:
      SsoException - if resend operation fails
      IllegalArgumentException - if identifier is null/empty
